summary: Suresh Sinha, a famous director, discovers star potential in Shanti, a woman he stumbled into one rainy evening, and casts her as the lead in a film. In a twist of fate, Shanti becomes a superstar and Suresh faces a decline in his career.
cast: Waheeda Rehman|Guru Dutt|Kumari Naaz|Johnny Walker|Mahesh Kaul|Veena|Minoo Mumtaz|Nilofer|Ruby Mayer|Sheela Vaz|Vikram Kapoor|Mehmood|Mohan Choti|Munshi Munakka|Haroon|V. Ratra|Tony Walker|Ratna|Tun Tun|Pratima Devi|Tina Misquitta
title: Paper Flowers
